thread.title: John doe

author: John doe
title: John doe
text: I ordered a fuel pump 4 days ago and when it came it was missing the wire harness connector now and I'm getting the runaround I asked to speak with management after looking up their phone number because they do not respond to emails and they hung up on me not a good place to do business broke customer service reps disrespecting you they will never get another dollar from me
